NavigationDestinationIndex.summary:
NOTE Experimental The index read-only property of the
interface returns the value of the destination if the is traverse, or -1 otherwise.

remarks.para:
-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer
-Domenic Denicola's Navigation API live demo

NavigationDestinationIndex.value: A number representing the index of the destination , or -1.
